聯.definition: (bound form) to ally oneself with; to unite; to combine; to join; (bound form) (poetry) antithetical couplet

聯係.definition: variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]

聯俄.definition: alliance with Russia (e.g. of early Chinese communists)

聯動.definition: (of the parts of a machine) to move together; to act in coordination; to be coupled; linkage

聯合.definition: to combine; to join; unite; alliance

聯合包裹服務公司.pinyin: lián hé bāo guǒ fú wù gōng sī

聯合國兒童基金會.pinyin: lián hé guó ér tóng jī jīn huì

聯合國安全理事會.pinyin: lián hé guó ān quán lǐ shì huì

聯合國教科文組織.pinyin: lián hé guó jiào kē wén zǔ zhī
聯合國教科文組織.definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

聯合國氣候變化框架公約.pinyin: lián hé guó qì hòu biàn huà kuāng jià gōng yuē
聯合國氣候變化框架公約.definition: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

聯合國海洋法公約.pinyin: lián hé guó hǎi yáng fǎ gōng yuē
聯合國海洋法公約.definition: United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea

聯合國環境規劃署.pinyin: lián hé guó huán jìng guī huà shǔ

聯合國秘書處.pinyin: lián hé guó mì shū chù

聯合國糧農組織.pinyin: lián hé guó liáng nóng zǔ zhī
聯合國糧農組織.definition: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

聯合國開發計劃署.pinyin: lián hé guó kāi fā jì huà shǔ

聯合國難民事務高級專員辦事處.pinyin: lián hé guó nán mín shì wù gāo jí zhuān yuán bàn shì chù
聯合國難民事務高級專員辦事處.definition: Office of the UN High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)

聯合式合成詞.pinyin: lián hé shì hé chéng cí

聯合技術公司.pinyin: lián hé jì shù gōng sī

聯合自強.definition: to combine together for self-improvement; joint movement for self-strengthening

聯大.definition: abbr. for 聯合國大會|联合国大会[Lian2 he2 guo2 Da4 hui4], United Nations General Assembly; abbr. for 國立西南聯合大學|国立西南联合大学[Guo2 li4 Xi1 nan2 Lian2 he2 Da4 xue2], National Southwest Combined University

聯姻.definition: related by marriage; to connect by marriage (families, work units)

聯想.definition: to associate (cognitively); to make an associative connection; mental association; word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs

聯手.definition: lit. to join hands; to act together

聯接.definition: variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]

聯播.definition: to broadcast over a network; (radio or TV) hookup; simulcast

聯機.definition: online; network; to connect online; to connect an electronic device to another device

聯機分析處理.pinyin: lián jī fēn xī chù lǐ

聯歡.definition: to have a get-together; celebration; party

聯產到勞.definition: to pay sb according to their productivity

聯產到戶.definition: household responsibility system, introduced in the early 1980s, under which each rural household could freely decide what to produce and how to sell, as long as it fulfilled its quota of products to the state

聯結.definition: to bind; to tie; to link

聯絡.definition: to get in touch with; to contact; to stay in contact (with); liaison; (math.) connection

聯網.definition: to connect (or be connected) to a network; to network

聯綴.definition: variant of 連綴|连缀[lian2 zhui4]

聯綿.definition: variant of 連綿|连绵[lian2 mian2]

聯綿詞.definition: two-syllable word featuring alliteration or rhyme, such as 玲瓏|玲珑[ling2 long2]

聯繫.definition: connection; contact; relation; to get in touch with; to integrate; to link; to touch

聯署.definition: joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)

聯翩.definition: (literary) to come in quick succession; wave after wave

聯聘.definition: (of multiple institutions, departments or organizations) to jointly recruit; to jointly appoint (sb)

聯航.definition: China United Airlines, abbr. for 中國聯合航空|中国联合航空[Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 he2 Hang2 kong1]

聯號.definition: variant of 連號|连号[lian2 hao4]

聯調聯試.definition: debugging and commissioning; testing (of a whole system)

聯貫.definition: variant of 連貫|连贯[lian2 guan4]

聯通紅籌公司.pinyin: lián tōng hóng chóu gōng sī
聯通紅籌公司.definition: Unicom Red Chip, Hong Kong subsidiary of China Unicom 中國聯通|中国联通[Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 tong1]

聯運.definition: through transport; through traffic jointly organized by different enterprises

聯邦.definition: federal; federation; commonwealth; federal union; federal state; union

聯邦緊急措施署.pinyin: lián bāng jǐn jí cuò shī shǔ

聯邦通信委員會.pinyin: lián bāng tōng xìn wěi yuán huì

聯隊.definition: wing (of an air force); sports team representing a combination of entities (e.g. United Korea)
